data.actual_result: The more options popup appeared a little far away from the More Options button
data.expected_result: The more options popup should appear right below the More Options button
data.short_description: More options popup misplaced when zoomed in
data.steps_to_repro: - Zoom in to the maximum using the Ctrl and the equal button - Right click on a user - Click on Profile - Click on the More Options button (that 3 dots next to the "Send Message" button)
